description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into various types of gas at will, making them a Gas Human. The user can become intangible, levitate, and manipulate existing gases in the environment.

users.circumstances: Caesar Clown ate the fruit at some point before his appearance on Punk Hazard

abilityReveals.description: The user can transform their entire body into gas, appearing as a gaseous figure. Caesar keeps this ability activated constantly.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar appears to the captured Straw Hats in his gaseous form as the mysterious 'Master.'

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to seawater

strengths.strength: Logia intangibility - can avoid physical attacks by transforming into gas
strengths.description: As a Logia-type user, can become intangible and reform from gas.

strengths.strength: Gas manipulation - can create and control various types of gas including poisonous gases
strengths.description: User can manipulate different types of gases for various purposes.

description: Grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into snow at will, making them a Snow Human. The user can become intangible and use snow-based attacks.

users.circumstances: Monet ate the fruit before arriving at Punk Hazard as a Donquixote Pirates operative

abilityReveals.description: The user can quickly transform into snow to disappear from sight, as demonstrated when Monet vanished after Usopp spotted her.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Monet uses her snow powers to disappear when Usopp alerts the others to her presence on the burned building.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to seawater

strengths.strength: Logia intangibility - can avoid physical attacks by transforming into snow
strengths.description: As a Logia-type user, can become intangible and reform from snow.
